evidence.claim: Fairfax Software engages with HIPAA compliance in its solutions.
The company has resources detailing their adherence to EDI X12 standards for healthcare transactions.
Fairfax Software utilizes FHIR standards in their health tech solutions.
They provide case studies about the integration of their platforms with various health systems.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in health tech with focus on X12 and integration, aligning with API automation needs.
